properties.Name: Tax
properties.Description: A tax that may be applied to a bill.

Columns.Name: TaxId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Tax.

Columns.Name: TaxEffectiveTimestamp
Columns.Description: The timestamp that the Tax was effective.

Columns.Name: TaxDiscontinuedTimestamp
Columns.Description: The timestamp that the Tax was discontinued.

Columns.Name: TaxAmount
Columns.Description: The applicable tax amount. To be used where the amount of tax is a flat rate rather than a percentage.

Columns.Name: MinimumTaxableAmount
Columns.Description: The minimum transaction or transaction line amount for which tax is applicable. For example a product with a minimum taxable amount of $5.00 and a maximum taxable amount of $10.00, tax would only be applied to the product at the tax rate for any value of the product between $5 and $10. If the product is less than $5 no tax would be incurred, if the product is > $10 tax would only be incurred on (10-5=5) the amount between the minimum and maximum taxable amounts.

Columns.Name: MaximumTaxableAmount
Columns.Description: The maximum transaction or transaction line amount for which tax is applicable. For example a product with a minimum taxable amount of $5.00 and a maximum taxable amount of $10.00, tax would only be applied to the product at the tax rate for any value of the product between $5 and $10. If the product is less than $5 no tax would be incurred, if the product is > $10 tax would only be incurred on (10-5=5) the amount between the minimum and maximum taxable amounts.

Columns.Name: TaxTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a tax type.

Columns.Name: TaxingAuthorityPartyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Party.

Columns.Name: TaxResponsiblePartyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Party.
